title: Glottography dataset derived from Edwards 2020 "Metathesis and unmetathesis in Amarasi"
description: This dataset provides contemporary, non-overlapping language ranges for language groups of Timor and self-identified varieties of Meto as depicted in Fig. 1.1 and 1.2 of Edwards 2020.
citation: Edwards, Owen D. 2020. Metathesis and unmetathesis in Amarasi. Berlin: Language Science Press. doi: 10.5281/zenodo.3700413.
